### Government Tender Announcement

**Notice Title:** Truck, Aircraft Cargo Loading-Unloading, 6804 Kg (15,000 Lbs) Capacity

**Solicitation Number:** W8476-246863/A

**Publication Date:** June 4, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** July 24, 2024, at 14:00 hours

The Department of National Defence has a requirement to procure one (1) truck, capable of hauling heavy cargo, for delivery to Canadian Forces Base Winnipeg, Manitoba. The procurement will also include loading and unloading equipment for aircraft cargo.

**Critical Details:**

* Weight capacity: 6804 kg (15,000 pounds)
* Diesel engine driven
* Required delivery date: 120 days from order receipt
* Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN): 2320
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) participation is expected

**Pre-Qualification Requirements:**
To be considered, suppliers must demonstrate their ability to meet the following criteria:

* Provide a low-bid submission
* Comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* Deliver the truck and loading/unloading equipment within the specified timeframe

**Bid Submission Process:**
Electronic submissions only are accepted. Suppliers should submit bids via:

DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

**Additional Information:**
The Department of National Defence may negotiate with suppliers during the procurement process.

Please find the solicitation package at the following URLs:

* Original Solicitation Document: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/39171/en-rfp-w8476-246863-a-original.pdf>
* Amendment 001: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/39171/en-rfp-w8476-246863-amendment-001.pdf>
* Amendment 002: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/39171/en-rfp-w8476-246863-amendment-002.pdf>

For further clarification or questions, please refer to the solicitation documentation or contact Lidija Al Brich at Lidija.Albrich@forces.gc.ca. Supplier inquiries will be addressed according to the specified timelines in the solicitation package. Respond to this notice by the close of business on July 24, 2024, at the latest.
